name: Movies About Historical Figures Trivia Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Ironically, this actor who did such a brilliant job portraying Abraham Lincoln in 'Abe Lincoln in Illinois' was Canadian-born.
In a rarely shown movie, this actor played the title role in 'Freud'.
questions.explanation:
Montgomery Clift.

	It was Monty - no kidding.

questions.text: In 'They Died With Their Boots on', this actor played Custer.
questions.explanation:
Errol Flynn.

	Fun, even if it's not entirely accurate.

Cliff Robertson.

	Before the days of scandal.

questions.text: Tyrone Power played the lead in 'Jesse James'. Who played his brother, Frank (and had the lead in the sequel)?
This actor had the title role in 'Al Capone' (1959).
This actress played the title role in a so-so version of Joan of Arc.
questions.explanation:
Ingrid Bergman.

	They can't all be good.

questions.text: This actress played the title role in 'Song of Bernadette'
This actor played Lindbergh in 'Spirit of St Louis'.
questions.explanation:
James Stewart.

	Stewart did just about everything.

questions.text: F Murray Abraham received a well-deserved Oscar for his role in Amadeus ... but who actually played the title role of Mozart?
questions.explanation:
Tom Hulce.

	A deserved oscar nomination.
